name: SHE
description:
Message 2/1: Friday March 3rd, 1989. 05:31AM "She will never let us escape, the walls are moving. There's no way o— *inaudible*.

CONTROLS:
Left - Right

RULES:
- Each time one of your guys escapes the maze, the maze advances
- Each time none of your guys can make a move, the maze advances

Design & programming - Rémi Bismuth
Sounds & music - Maxime Ferrieu
